dc_title_s: Map of the White Mountains, New Hampshire : from original surveys
dc_description_s: Relief shown by hachures and spot heights.; Shows roads, buildings, and township boundaries.; Mt. Adams and Mt. Jefferson shown transposed.; "Entered according to Act of Congress in the year 1858, by Harvey Boardman, in the Clerk's Office of the District Court of Massachusetts."--Lower margin.; Includes 9 ills. of hotels and Crawford Notch; also 2 tables of distances.|49 x 56 centimeters, folded to 14 x 9 centimeters, in cover 15 x 10 centimeters|Scale approximately 1:102,000|General Map Collection
